Text:
Yup. But you have cue files so you can separate them easily.

Like ^ said, use PowerISO (I dunno how) or the one I use, freeware OS software called Medieval CUE Splitter :)
http://www.medieval.it/cuesplitter-pc/menu-id-71.html

There's also a MAC version around but I've never tried that.
Thanks for the awesome upload, I'm loving this mix.
